summary: A young man raised in the American South discovers he is an Indian prince whose throne was taken by usurpers.
cast: Rudolph Valentino|Wanda Hawley|Pat Moore|Charles Ogle|Fanny Midgley|Robert Ober|Jack Giddings|Edward Jobson|Josef Swickard|Bertram Grassby|J. Farrell MacDonald|George Periolat|George Field|Maude Wayne|William Boyd|Joseph Harrington|Spottiswoode Aitken|Julanne Johnston
keywords: reference to krishna the hindu deity|usurper|bare chested male|yale university|temple
title: El rajah de Dharmagar
